incidents.name: Investigating inability to configure "off" flag variations

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

The issue with "off" variation configuration has been identified and a fix is being implemented. We are continuing to monitor the performance of impacted services. We will continue to update this page until it is fully resolved.

Self-service customers are experiencing an inability to change the flag configuration that the "off" variation severs via the product interface. We are investigating and will provide updates as they become available.

incident_updates.body: The issue with the Jira integration errors has been resolved with the LaunchDarkly for Jira version 1.0.18-AC from Atlassian Marketplace. Affected customers who have not yet received the update from Atlassian may manually update the integration from Jira administration.

We have published the fix for Jira integration. The fix is expected to automatically roll out to affected customers' Jira instances within the next several hours. As a workaround to waiting, customers may manually update the integration from their Jira administration.
We have identified the issue with errors when using our Jira integration. We are continuing our work to resolve it.
We are investigating reports with customers experiencing errors when using Jira integration. We are investigating and will provide updates as they become available.

We are experiencing an issue with a third party usage billing vendor. Billing itself is not affected, but rendered customer usage in product may be undercounted since June 5th, 2024. We are working with the third party to recalculate the usage data. No data has been lost.
